title: Robots may become heroes in war on coronavirus - Times of India
description: Robots may become heroes in war on coronavirus Times of India Understanding the basics of 'herd immunity' and fighting the coronavirus Health24 View Full coverage on Google News
content:
SAN FRANCISCO: Long maligned as job-stealers and aspiring overlords, robots are being increasingly relied on as fast, efficient, contagion-proof champions in the war against the deadly coronavirus.
One team of robots temporarily cared for patients in a makes… [+3921 chars]
